original_text: But the Lord hurled a great wind upon the sea, and there was a mighty tempest on the sea, so that the ship threatened to break up.
korean_text: 여호와께서 큰 바람을 바다 위에 내리시매 바다 가운데에 큰 폭풍이 일어나 배가 거의 깨지게 된지라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord hurled a great wind upon the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주께서 바다 위에 큰 바람을 일으키셨다

sentences.original_text: and there was a mighty tempest on the sea
so that the ship threatened to break up
